data.title: John Wyndham, John Beynon Harris
data.meta_description: New York: Ballantine Books. 1959 . Small octavo, pictorial wrappers. First U.S. edition. Collects four Troon stories. A brief, episodic 'family saga' about the near future exploration of space. - Pringle, The Ultimate Guide to Science Fiction, second edition 1995 , p. 271. A fine, unread copy #156776
data.text:
Wyndham, John (pseudonym of John Beynon Harris). THE OUTWARD URGE. New York: Ballantine Books. [1959]. Small octavo, pictorial wrappers. First U.S. edition. Collects four Troon stories. "A brief, episodic 'family saga' about the near future exploration of space." - Pringle, The Ultimate Guide to Science Fiction, second edition (1995), p. 271. A fine, unread copy (#156776).

Price: $25.00
